title: Thresh Painting in VR (HTC VIVE + Google Tiltbrush)

embed.description: Thresh from League of Legends painted in virtual reality. HTC Vive with Google Tiltbrush You decide what we draw next!

body:
Hi,

i tried something new with the HTC Vive and painted/sculpted Thresh in Virtual Reality.
Thanks for beeing such an awesome community of artist and inspiring people.

(Im German so dont yell at me for wrong grammar)
Greetings from the Black Forrest!

replies.body: WHY does league NOT have a dwarf Champion.....ðŸ¤”
So awsome! The heads a little small and Im not sure you needed all that glowy bright effects, it looked cool enough without em. How did you do this so well?

Thanks for taking the time to comment!
You are absolutely right about the head. im still trying to get the details down on how to do facial features in VR.
Expect to see minor improvements in every video ;)
Thank you very much for watching!
